BH/Blastrage


The skimmer detects 4 missle flying down at it. An autoguns pops up 
and fires un all of the missles destroying them. 

Blastrage aim the gernade launcher at Hell Beast. He fires 2 rounds
of 
10x gernades. He fires his Optic Blast, 2 of them, at Gremlin.

BH fires his 2 semi-automatics, 25 lasers each, at TigerHawk. BH then 
add 3 Optic Blast for a good measure.
